00024 FootStep::FootStep()
00025 {
00026     p.set(0.0, 0.0);
00027     angle = 0.0; ca = 0.0; sa = 0.0;
00028     Offset.set(0.0, 0.0);
00029     nSS = 0;
00030     n = 0;
00031     RL = 0;
00032 }

00061 FootStep::FootStep(double _angle, Point2D _p, int _nSS, int _n, int _RL, double *_d)
00062 {
00063     ctr.set_size(_d);
00064     set(_angle, _p, _nSS, _n, _RL);
00065     Offset.set(0.0, 0.0);
00066 }

00078 void FootStep::set(double _angle, Point2D _p, int _nSS, int _n, int _RL)  
00079 {
00080     p.set(_p.x, _p.y);
00081     angle = _angle; ca = cos(angle); sa = sin(angle);
00082     ctr.rotate_translate(ca, sa, p);
00083     nSS = _nSS;
00084     n = _n;
00085     RL = _RL;
00086 }

00091 void FootStep::print()
00092 {
00093     printf("----------------------------------\n");
00094     printf(" nSS = %d, n = %d, RL = %d  \n", nSS, n, RL);
00095     printf(" angle = % f, \n", angle);
00096     printf(" Offset = [% f, %f] \n", Offset.x, Offset.y);
00097     p.print();
00098     ctr.print();
00099     printf("----------------------------------\n");
00100 }
